data.title: Buy Amazon (AMZN) Stock on the Dip Before a 2020 Rally?
data.text: Is now the time to buy Amazon stock on the dip heading into 2020 with AMZN stock down 6% in the last six months?

data.title: Buy Amazon While It’s on Sale
data.text: Amazon has been beaten down by worries about the cost of its shift to one-day shipping, but those concerns are likely overdone making now a good time to buy the stock.

data.title: Amazon Prime members can place orders on Dec. 24 and get items by Christmas day
data.text: Amazon Prime members still have nearly two weeks to have purchases delivered while non-Prime shoppers only have a few more days for free delivery.

data.title: Amazon extends its holiday shopping window with one-day shipping and new stores
data.text: The online seller will let last-minute shoppers use its stores, same-day deliveries and grocery shipments on Dec. 24.

data.title: Amazon Boosts Sports Portfolio With Champions League Rights
data.text: Amazon (AMZN) strengthens competitive position in the video streaming market with broadcasting rights of European soccer Champions League matches in Germany.

data.title: Amazon has 5 days to save its big bet on UK food delivery
data.text: Amazon's play for the UK food delivery market is in doubt after Britain's competition regulator said the company's planned investment in Deliveroo could harm customers.

data.title: Amazon (AMZN) Leases Space in Manhattan to Build New Office
data.text: Amazon (AMZN) plans to open a new office in Manhattan in a bid to further expand in New York.

data.title: Amazon and Apple will be our doctors in the future, says tech guru Peter Diamandis
data.text: “Do I think Apple and Google and Amazon can do a better job? A thousandfold.

data.title: Amazon's stake in Deliveroo may require 'in-depth investigation,' UK competition watchdog warns
data.text: The U.S. tech giant led a $575 million funding round for Deliveroo earlier this year.
